author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Gear up for race day! This plugin highlights the upcoming Grand Prix with circuit details, location, date, and a slick track image.

It was created by Daniel Sitnik, Principal Architect @ Accenture Brazil and creator of small things. Want a custom TRMNL Plugin for you? Check my ko-fi link below or e-mail me! ðŸ™‚

custom_fields.name: Shortcut URL
custom_fields.description:
Import this shortcut on your iPhone or iPad.
Set up automations to trigger it at 00:05 and when Reminders is closed.
You will need to know the UUID of this plugin instance while importing.
Note that only reminders with a due date will be sent to TRMNL using this Shortcut.

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description: Get a clear forecast for your day or week. Features unique vertical 'pills' showing temperature ranges and weather severity (darker = stormy). Designed to give you the outlook at a single glance.

custom_fields.description: Get a clear forecast for your day or week. Features unique vertical 'pills' showing temperature ranges and weather severity (darker = stormy). Designed to give you the outlook at a single glance.

custom_fields.help_text: Search for your location at latlong.net and copy the value here.

custom_fields.help_text: Search for your location at latlong.net and copy the value here.

custom_fields.name: Temperature Unit
custom_fields.description: Celsius or Fahrenheit?

custom_fields.name: Forecast Interval
custom_fields.description: How detailed should the timeline be?
custom_fields.help_text: Choose 'Hourly' for immediate details or 'Daily' for the week ahead.

custom_fields.name: Current Time Format
custom_fields.description: Custom format for the current time.
custom_fields.help_text:
Use standard strftime codes. Test at strftime.net.
Examples:
12-hour: %-I:%M %p
24-hour: %H:%M

custom_fields.name: Hourly Time Format
custom_fields.description: Custom format for column headers (hourly forecast).
custom_fields.help_text:
Use standard strftime codes. Test at strftime.net.
Examples:
12-hour: %-I %p
24-hour: %H:00 or %Hh

custom_fields.name: Date Format
custom_fields.description: Custom format for column headers (daily forecast).
custom_fields.help_text: Use standard strftime codes. Test at strftime.net.

custom_fields.name: Bar Count
custom_fields.description: Total number of bars to display.
custom_fields.help_text: Tweak this number to fit the bars perfectly on your screen width.

custom_fields.name: Hide title bar
custom_fields.description: Remove the title for a cleaner look.

custom_fields.name: Location Label
custom_fields.description: A custom label to indicate your location (e.g., Home, Office).
custom_fields.help_text: Displayed on the right side of the title bar.

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Hourly weather forecast plugin with Open-Meteo Backend. No API key required.
NOTE: Click save right after plugin import, to populate the required fields to fetch the weather data. Otherwise you will get "Liquid error" messages.
Report bugs and translation issues on GitHub link below.

custom_fields.name: About This Plugin
custom_fields.description:
Hourly weather forecast plugin with Open-Meteo Backend. No API key required.
NOTE: Click save right after plugin import, to populate the required fields to fetch the weather data. Otherwise you will get "Liquid error" messages.
Report bugs and translation issues on GitHub link below.
